name: Experiment Fund
overview: Experiment Fund is a venture capital firm specializing in seed and early stage investments. It focuses on investing in student start-ups and novel technologies. It invests in startups connected to Harvard but will also be looking at Boston area startups that do not have Harvard ties. The firm seeks to invest in IT, healthcare, and energy technologies. The firm focuses on investing in Cambridge or those who started their educations there. It the fund plans to invest between $100,000 and $500,000 per startup. The Experiment Fund is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.
